text: Gao Tingyu (born 15 December 1997) is a Chinese speed skater who competes internationally. The 20-year-old made his Olympic debut at the 2018 PyeongChang Olympics, winning a bronze medal in the Men's 500m speed skating event. In doing so, Gao becomes the first male speed skater from China to win a medal in Olympic speed skating. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Chinese male speed skaters Category:Olympic speed skaters of China Category:Speed skaters at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:Medalists at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:Olympic medalists in speed skating Category:Olympic bronze medalists for China Category:Speed skaters at the 2017 Asian Winter Games Category:Medalists at the 2017 Asian Winter Games Category:Asian Games medalists in speed skating Category:Asian Games gold medalists for China Category:People from Yichun, Heilongjiang Category:World Single Distances Speed Skating Championships medalists
title: Gao Tingyu
